ul.li: Machine translation (MT) meta information can now be provided in the EXP and TMX memory import format and is passed on to the MTLOG evaluation when MT proposals have been used
Separate recording of think time in MTLOG evaluation
MT output during analysis now supports the NOPROPOSAL outputs in the EXP format (switches NOPROPOSALEXP and NOPROPOSALEXP_NODUPLICATE)
<codeblock> and <meta> areas in IBMDITA files can now be protected (using option in analysis panel)
The document export in validation format now keeps a list of last used values for "Translator" and "Project Manager"
